help_texts.getting_started:
1. Drag nodes from palette
2. Connect nodes with edges
3. Configure parameters
4. Run dry-run first
5. Execute when ready
help_texts.safety_tips:
Safety First:
- Always dry-run before execute
- Check node colors (red = writes)
- Review approvals carefully
- Keep backups of important data
help_texts.keyboard_shortcuts:
Shortcuts:
- Ctrl+S: Save
- Ctrl+Z: Undo
- Delete: Remove selected
- Space: Pan canvas
- Ctrl+A: Select all
- F5: Run dry-run
